description:
The Atomic Hawx Prime XTD 95 HT GW offers ultimate comfort, a friendly flex, and all the features you expect from a Hawx. This medium-width boot with a 100mm last lets you step into comfort right out of the box thanks to the 3D Silver liner with an Achilles Flex Zone. GripWalk pads, a Free/Lock 4.0 system, and the Frictionless Pivot makes getting around on the mountain easier than ever.

  • Shell and cuff are made of light and stiff polyurethane
  • Progressive shell is reinforced where needed without adding unnecessary weight
  • Heat mouldable shell and liner ensures a perfect fit
  • Liner has pre-shaped zones around the ankle and heel for great downhill performance
  • Free/Lock 4.0 ski/walk mechanism gives you 54° range of motion for climbing and 13-17° of forward lean for skiing
  • Hybrid Tech (HT) tech inserts in the toe allow for compatibility with hybrid bindings
  • Frictionless pivot uses polymer bushings to provide natural movement on ascents
  • 4 aluminum buckles and a power strap provide a precise and secure fit
name: Atomic Hawx Prime XTD 95 W HT GW Ski Boots - Women's
